title: The Rebuilding Categories and Absolute Units
description:
Nora, Ben, and Danny break down which teams are off track during their rebuild, which teams are an offseason away, and which teams are ready to compete in the 2022-23 season. They also premiere the Absolute Units segment.


Host: Nora Princiotti, Ben Solak, and Danny Heifetz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
